user_query: I am planning a trip to India and would like to check the real-time status of my train reservation. Can you provide me with the current status of my reservation with PNR number 6217743114? Also, I would like to know the live running status of train number 12345. Please provide the expected arrival and departure times.

TaskList.description: Check the current status of the train reservation using the provided PNR number.
Retrieve live running status of the train using the provided train number.
